item.title: Nead help whit some changes
item.dc:creator: @bobbymoore64 bobbymoore64
item.description:
@bobbymoore64 wrote:

[quote=“pkedpker, post:2, topic:34754”]you cant change the default max money value unless you change everyones client with a new datatype for money[/quote]lol u dont do tht

Step 1: Open player.java and search for
[test]public int maxItemAmount =[/test]

then change the number after that

(The max amount is 2147483647)if u put anything more u will get errors

Read full topic
